sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Ointment Mixer for preparation of homogeneous semi-solid formulations.
sections.scope: Applicable to ointment manufacturing activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Verify cleanliness of mixing vessel, stirrer, and lid.
Check heating/cooling jacket connections and utility supply.
Load base ingredients into the vessel and start heating if required.
Power ON the stirrer and set to appropriate speed.
Add active ingredients once the base is melted or at specified temperature.
Continue mixing until a uniform semi-solid mass is formed.
Observe for lumps or un-dispersed material and adjust mixing speed.
Cool the mixture gradually while maintaining slow agitation to prevent separation.
Discharge the finished ointment through the bottom valve.
Clean the vessel and stirrer immediately after use.
Document all manufacturing steps and parameters in the BMR.
precautions: Ensure ingredients are added in the correct sequence as per SOP.
Avoid air incorporation by adjusting stirrer speed and depth.
Monitor temperature carefully to prevent ingredient degradation.
Clean thoroughly to avoid cross-contamination between batches.
Use appropriate PPE for handling hot materials.
